meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nancy Adams Bruce Adelstein Peggy Johnson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #622.

td.p: Nancy Adams, a medical business manager from Albany, California
Bruce Adelstein, a research consultant from Los Angeles, California
Peggy Johnson, a teacher from San Diego, California

tr.td: (Alex: We're an equal opportunity show, so we've got...)
MAN IN SPACE
(Alex: Followed by...)
WOMEN IN HISTORY
CARTOONS
AUSTRALIA
IN OTHER WORDS...
HIPS

Japan

PeggyBruce
')

tr.td: Peggy
Bruce
Nancy

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Peggy
Bruce
Nancy
SCIENCE
RELIGION
MUSICAL ANATOMY
BUSINESS TRIVIA
BRITISH NOVELS
HOPS
(Alex: And since we had Hips in the first round, we've got [*] in this one.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Peggy
Bruce
Nancy

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[after revealing Bruce\'s answer]
(Alex: There were four assassinated presidents: Lincoln, Garfield, McKinley, JFK, and there were four others who died in office of natural causes for a total of [*]. You\'re right.)
NancyWhat is 6?
